languages.text: Порча генетических выродков могла распространиться по многим мирам и кораблям. Необходимо документировать каждый случай заражения.
The corruption of genetic aberrations could have spread across many worlds and ships. Each case of contamination must be documented.
languages.original_text: Порча генетических выродков могла распространиться по многим мирам и кораблям. Необходимо документировать каждый случай заражения.

traits.locale_text: The corruption of genetic anathemas could have spread across many worlds and ships. Each case of contamination must be documented.

languages.text: La corrupción de las aberraciones genéticas podría haberse extendido por muchos mundos y naves. Se debe documentar cada caso de contaminación.
languages.original_text: The corruption of genetic aberrations could have spread across many worlds and ships. Each case of contamination must be documented.

traits.locale_text: La corrupción de las aberraciones genéticas podría haberse extendido por muchos mundos y naves. Se debe documentar cada caso de contaminación.

languages.text: 遺伝的忌まわしきものの腐敗は、多くの世界や船に広がっている可能性がある。それぞれの汚染事例を記録しなければならない。
languages.original_text: The corruption of genetic aberrations could have spread across many worlds and ships. Each case of contamination must be documented.

traits.locale_text: 遺伝的忌まわしきものの腐敗は、多くの世界や船に広がっている可能性がある。それぞれの汚染事例を記録しなければならない。

languages.text: 携带腐化基因的怪物可能已经渗透到许多世界与舰船之中，每个受到腐化的案例都必须记录在案。
languages.original_text: The corruption of genetic aberrations could have spread across many worlds and ships. Each case of contamination must be documented.

traits.locale_text: 携带腐化基因的怪物可能已经渗透到许多世界与舰船之中，每个受到腐化的案例都必须记录在案。

languages.text: Die Verderbnis genetischer Abscheulichkeiten könnte sich auf vielen Welten und Schiffen verbreitet haben. Jeder Fall von Kontamination muss dokumentiert werden.
languages.original_text: The corruption of genetic aberrations could have spread across many worlds and ships. Each case of contamination must be documented.

traits.locale_text: Die Verderbnis genetischer Abscheulichkeiten könnte sich auf vielen Welten und Schiffen verbreitet haben. Jeder Fall von Kontamination muss dokumentiert werden.

languages.text: La corruption des aberrations génétiques a très bien pu se propager à de nombreux mondes et vaisseaux. Chaque foyer de contamination doit faire l'objet d'un rapport circonstancié.
languages.original_text: The corruption of genetic aberrations could have spread across many worlds and ships. Each case of contamination must be documented.

traits.locale_text: La corruption des aberrations génétiques a très bien pu se propager à de nombreux mondes et vaisseaux. Chaque foyer de contamination doit faire l'objet d'un rapport circonstancié.

languages.text: Genetik sapkı yozlaşması birçok dünyaya ve gemiye yayılmış olabilir. Her türlü hastalık durumu rapor altına alınmalı.
languages.original_text: The corruption of genetic aberrations could have spread across many worlds and ships. Each case of contamination must be documented.
